name: Mountain Wars
description:
Far in the Northern Mountains, two strong factions settle their differences on the battle field.  Later to be known as Mountain Wars set in the Northern Kingdom between the Dwarves and the Orcs.  

Hand Painted Pixel Art 

Game Art made in 64bit

Two Player Turn Based Strategy 2D Game

 Available for Mac OS  & Windows 64 bit 

Follow me on Instagram and Twitter @tienchiart
